document.full_text: security forces sealed off parts of the capital of china's vast northern region of inner mongolia on sunday to prevent residents from staging a planned mass protest after the hit-and-run death of a herder sparked six days of protests by ethnic mongolians.
document.title: china tightens grip on inner mongolia before planned
lines_and_colors: security forces sealed off parts of the capital of china's vast northern region of inner mongolia on sunday to prevent residents from staging a planned mass protest after the hit-and-run death of a herder sparked six days of protests by ethnic mongolians.
